entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA is a technology company specializing in computing platforms for applications such as gaming, data center, professional visualization, and automotive.

entities.name: GAMING
entities.description: Gaming is one of the large markets that NVIDIA's computing platforms address, driven by higher sales of GeForce GPUs and the popularity of gaming, esports, content creation, and streaming.

entities.name: DATA CENTER
entities.description: Data Center is one of the large markets that NVIDIA's computing platforms address, driven by sales of NVIDIA Ampere architecture GPUs for cloud computing and AI workloads.

entities.name: PROFESSIONAL VISUALIZATION
entities.description: Professional Visualization is one of the large markets that NVIDIA's computing platforms address, driven by demand for workstations and growth in workloads such as 3D design, AI, and rendering.

entities.name: AUTOMOTIVE
entities.description: Automotive is one of the large markets that NVIDIA's computing platforms address, driven by self-driving and AI cockpit solutions.
